document_data.name: Gilfron Milon
document_data.mainbody: '''Gilfron Milon''' was a merchant in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Gilfron was a friendly and pleasant individual. However, knowing that the roads were dangerous, he was cautious with every stranger. He pretended to be of a higher class than he was, pretending to speak with a false educated air.
document_data.Activities: Gilfron was a merchant of tools and lumber from [[Quivering Forest]], traveling along the [[Iron Route]] that connected all Moonsea's cities. He had many dealings with [[Lords' Alliance]].
document_data.History: In 1489 DR, leading a small caravan from [[Hillsfar]] to [[Phlan]], he met an adventuring party hired to investigate rumors of [[dracolich]]es and [[ghost ship]]s wandering the area. Gilfron directed them to a suspicious island ferry.
document_data.Relationship: Gilfron had a ten-year-old son [[Gilmont Milon]] who always traveled with him after his wife died of fever in around [[1486 DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Shadows over the Moonsea|12}}
